hadith.text: It was narrated from Ibn Umm Maktum that he said:"0 Messenger of Allah (ï·º), there are many (dangerous) pests and wild animals in Al-Madinah." He said: "Can you hear (the words) 'Come prayer, come to prosperity'?" He said "Yes." He said: "Then be quick to respond," and he did not grant him a dispensation
